org.orgName: District Court for the Fourth Judicial of Washington Territory

div1.p: In the District Court. Term, A.D. 188 at Territory of Washington, County of
In the District of Washington Territory, and for the Fourt Judicial District thereof holding terms of Cheney, Spokane County, for Spokane, Lincoln and Douglas Counties. Term. A.D 1888
The Territory of Washington. vs L.C. Waller (2207) Indictment for COST BILL.

Clerks fees s.a Clement Clerk 1888 May Docket .25 Appearance .50 Cost + file indictment .60 Issue warrant 1.00 Issue Subpoena .50 Red + file Subpoena .35 Warrant .35 Arraignment .50 Certified copy of indictment 2.00 Plea .50 Sentence .50 Commitment 1.00 File claims 5 witnesses .75 5 affiants 5 claims 1.25 File 5 affiants .50 Issue 5 certificates 2.00 Taxing costs .50 Final record 2.00 Two times 2.00 Two certificates 2.00 19 55. carried forward $19.55

Brot forward 1955 James Glispin Sheriff Serving Warrant + mileage 1.20 Serving Sub to 4 names 8 miles 2.40 3.60 Edward Luther 1 day + 2 miles 2.20 Peter Ericson 1 day + 2 miles 2.20
1 day + 2 miles 2.20 F.W. Middaugh 1 day + 2 miles 2.20 Wm Davis 1 day + 4 miles 2.40 11.60 $34 75

Territory of Washington County of Spokane James Glispin being duty sworn, deposes and says that he is Sheriff of Spokane County that the above and foregoing account is just, true and correct, and the services therein charged were actually and necessarily performed.
James Glispin Subscribed and sworn to before me this 28th day of June 1888

CERTIFICATE OF PROSECUTING ATTORNEY. I hereby certify that I have examined the foregoing bill of costs, and that the same amounting to the sum of 34.75 is just and correct. W.C. James Prosecuting Attorney for Spokane County

CERTIFICATE OF PRESIDING JUDGE I certify that I have examined the foregoing Bill of Costs, amounting to the sum of $34.75 and the same appearing to me to be just and correct, is hereby approved and allowed. David Allen Associate Justice Supreme Court of Washington Territory and Judge Fourth Judicial District
In the District Court of Washington Territory. Fourth Judicial District 2257 Term at The Territory of Washington vs. L.C. Waller, BILL OF COSTS
